QuestData.Title: The Big Kah-Oona
QuestData.Description: The leader of the Oona hozen is a brigand by the name of Lord Oona.$B$BI have heard fearsome tales of this roaming sea captain and his crew. Everywhere he takes his tribe, destruction follows.$B$BThe Oona land their boats on fertile soil, pillage the local villages, and drain the land dry before moving on to their next conquest.$B$BWe shall not allow the same to occur on our shores, not while I am still in charge.$B$BI need someone to go eradicate him now.
